item.title: 阿里巴巴、腾讯在中国高考期间冻结人工智能工具
item.description: 中国最受欢迎的人工智能聊天机器人（如阿里巴巴的 "问问"）暂时关闭了图片识别等功能，以防止学生在中国一年一度的 "高考 "中作弊。【原文：China’s most popular AI chatbots like Alibaba’s Qwen have temporarily disabled functions including picture recognition, to prevent students from cheating during the country’s annual “gaokao” college entrance examinations.】

item.title: 美国贸易谈判前中国稀土出口总量回升
item.description: 周一的海关数据显示，中国 5 月份稀土出口量回升至 5865 吨。【原文：Chinese exports of rare earths, a group of 17 minerals at the center of a trade dispute with Washington, recovered to 5,865 tons in May, according to customs data on Monday.】

item.title: 外国人将韩国债券购买连胜纪录延长至 2023 年以来最长
item.description: 随着新政府的上台，投资者对本地资产的偏好有所改善，韩国债券迎来了自 2023 年 4 月以来最长的外国人连续买入期。【原文：South Korean bonds are enjoying the longest streak of buying by foreigners since April 2023, as investor appetite for local assets improve with the new administration in place.】

item.title: 比特币买家 Metaplanet 因 54 亿美元筹资计划而跃升
item.description: Metaplanet 公司计划融资约 54 亿美元，以增加已经价值近 10 亿美元的比特币储备，该公司股价周一大涨。【原文：Metaplanet Inc.’s plan to raise about $5.4 billion to add to a Bitcoin stockpile that’s already worth close to $1 billion saw the company’s shares jump on Monday.】

item.title: 尽管贸易停战，中国对美出口仍创下 2020 年以来最大降幅
item.description: 中国上个月的出口增幅低于预期，原因是对美国的发货量出现了五年多来最严重的下降，抵消了其他市场的强劲需求。【原文：Chinese exports rose less than expected last month as the worst drop in shipments to the US in more than five years counteracted strong demand from other markets.】

item.title: 据说日本证券开发协会将就不合适的日本债券销售对经纪商进行调查
